Guidelines and Conditions 
Claim under this benefit will be admissible, only if 
1.
It  is payable under  personal accident section of the motor policy
2.
Injured person is the insured and was travelling in the vehicle as a driver or occupant.
3.
The insured may opt for this policy at the time of inception or at the time of renewal.
What is not covered?
